snippet: Faced with what they call misleading reports on Russian state television that ethnic-nationalist violence is sweeping Ukraine, Internet-savvy Ukrainian activists drew attention on Sunday to social media images to counter that narrative.
abstract: Faced with what they call misleading reports on Russian state television that ethnic-nationalist violence is sweeping Ukraine, Internet-savvy Ukrainian activists drew attention on Sunday to social media images to counter that narrative.

headline.main: Ukrainian Activists Work to Counter Russian Narrative on Social Networks
